attributes.action: Stop Cypriots from mist netting migrating song birds
attributes.additional_details: RSPB report 16th March 2017. Acacia trees are not natural to Cyprus and were planted on airfield perimeter.  75 species that are killed are endangered in the UK.
attributes.background: This slaughter happens each season.  Over 500,000 Birds are lured into the nets strung between Acacia trees on perimeter UK Airfield

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to raise this issue with the government of Cyprus.
